name: Still Dark At Dawn
description:
Still Dark At Dawn features a unique, high immersion locomotion system.

A routine check of orbital station D-745 goes horribly wrong when you discover mysterious virus is rapidly degrading your vision.

Still Dark At Dawn's highly immersive gameplay will test your grit and ability to trust all of your senses, in a hope survive The Dawn.



Features:
  • Virtual Reality Shooter
  • Unique high immersion locomotion system, swing your arms to move about the world
  • Hide and Seek Stealth
  • Run and Gun Action
  • Multiple enemy types
